committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating the month of June of each year as Combat Huntington's Disease Month.

summary.text: Designates the month of June of each year as "Combat Huntington's Disease Month." Sets such month aside to review and assess our nation's progress toward finding a cure for the disease and to strengthen our resolve to reach that goal.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating the month of June of each year as Combat Huntington's Disease Month.
